product.title: The Bears’ Picnic | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
The Bear family is going on a picnic! Papa Bear leads the way because he insists he knows the perfect picnic spot. But as the Bears arrive at each new spot, a perfect place it is not! Readers will laugh at Papa’s mistakes, and will eventually see that there’s no place like home for the Bears’ picnic.

Tie-in Activity: For extra fun at snack time, have an indoor picnic. Spread out a blanket on the floor, and then enjoy some simple finger foods, such as dry cereal, with your child as you read the story together.
